name: Training for pre-school teachers
description: Within the field of Education, this involves the study of theories, methods, and practices for teaching children up to 7 years of age in formal pre-primary or early childhood educational settings. [cite: 50, 51]

name: Early childhood teaching (within formal school settings)
description: This refers to the practical application of teaching methods for young children in formal educational environments, as covered in Training for pre-school teachers. [cite: 51]

name: Pre-primary teacher training
description: Specific training programmes designed to prepare educators for teaching at the pre-primary level, a key component of Training for pre-school teachers. [cite: 51]
